info.name: Customer Profile & Order History API
info.description: API endpoints for customer profile and order history

request.description: Login with email or phone number
Logout and revoke current access token

Get authenticated customer profile with:
- Name, email, phone
- Total orders count
- Last 10 order history
- Latest order details
- Created at timestamp
